Name: Hani Ar-Rifai
BioText:
Hani Ar Rifai was born in the city of Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. Sheikh Hani Ar-Rifai is the Imam and Khateeb of Masjid Anani in the same city.

During his learning of the Holy Quran, the esteemed Shaykh had the privilege of being in the company of and attaining knowledge from other well-known Shuyookh such as Shaykh Muhammad Ibn Abdu Rahim Achichin, Sheikh Ali Jaber, and Sheikh Muhammad Yusuf.

He completed his specialization in Islamic Studies at King Abdulaziz University and sought education under the guidance of prominent scholars and sheikhs such as Shaykh Al-allamah Abdullah Bin Bayyah, Sheikh Khaldoun Al-Ahdab, and Sheikh Ali Jaber, among others.

Owing to his emotional and soul-warming rendition of the Book of Allah, Sheikh Hani Ar-Rifai was elected as a special reciter of the Holy Quran in the Royal Court by the Saudi Ministry of Culture and Information.

He was granted the coveted designation as the Director of the legal affairs of King Faysalâ€™s Hospital and the Research Center in Jeddah.
